attributes.action: Close Schools/Colleges/Universities Due To The Rise Of Coronavirus Cases.
attributes.additional_details: The Government gave the slogan "Don't kill granny" towards the youth, to stop them from spreading Coronavirus, but the government is 'killing granny' for us. Coronavirus, does not care if the place is a school or workplace, it will spread, and it will kill.
attributes.background: The government has blamed the youth for the spread of Coronavirus, if this is true, schools and colleges should be closed and online classes should resume. Health is above education.

rejection.details:
We already have a petition calling for schools and colleges to be reclosed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

If you also want the Government to close universities, you could start a new petition requesting this.
